Uses of Class
com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.AbstractClassFileTransformer

  • Packages that use AbstractClassFileTransformer 
    Package Description
    com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform
    Contains class file transformers.

    • Uses of AbstractClassFileTransformer in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform

      Subclasses of AbstractClassFileTransformer in com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.example.transform 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClassFileTransformerExampleA
      Transforms ExampleA class by modifying its private method incrementCounter() according to the following algorithm:
      search for any field access inside the method incrementCounter() if it's a write access and the JVM field signature is "I", replace the access by increment by 2 According to the algorithm described above, the original method body
      class  ClassFileTransformerExampleB
      Transforms ExampleB class by modifying all its declared non-native methods according to the following algorithm:
      for every declared non-native method in ExampleB search for BigDecimal constructor calls substitute any found call of BigDecimal constructor with call of BigDecimalProxyFactoryExampleB.create(...) method with the same arguments According to the described above algorithm, the original method body
      class  ClassFileTransformerExampleC
      Transforms ExampleC class by modifying the return value of its private method createFaucetColorCodeMap().
      class  ClassFileTransformerExampleD
      Transforms String class by modifying the body of its method String.toString().
